title: Can Del Toro Go the Distance? These Are the Stages That Will Decide the Giro d’Italia
content:
Giro week three primer: Historically hard final week puts pink jersey in peril as Del Toro takes on climbing veterans across 20,000 meters of mountain ascent.

Read the full article at Can Del Toro Go the Distance? These Are the Stages That Will Decide the Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
